name: Goblin Boss
description: The Goblin Boss is a small, agile humanoid that serves as a leader among goblins, wielding a scimitar and commanding its minions effectively.
memorable: Commands lesser goblins to attack and has nimble retreat options.
goals: To lead and coordinate goblin attacks against adventurers.
relations: Can command up to three goblins within range during combat.
environment: Commonly found in caves or areas occupied by goblins.
strengths: Good Dexterity and tactical command of goblins enhance its combat abilities.
weaknesses: Average Constitution limits its endurance in protracted battles.
attacks: Attacks with a scimitar dealing slashing damage or fires a shortbow dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Command Minions allows multiple goblins to attack simultaneously.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, but has average passive perception.
skills: Proficient in stealth and intimidation, allowing it to hide and intimidate effectively.
additional_information: Has the ability to evade attacks with Nimble Escape.
Utilizes multiattack for increased damage output.
Can command allies to enhance the number of attacks in combat.
test_queries: cunning goblin leader with good mobility
goblin that commands minions in combat
small humanoid that uses scimitar and commands
